text: @ChrissieEvert 43 years in medicine, a Masters Degree in Nursing,community health & Immunology courses have taught me one thing! Tennis players should shut the fuck up on matters important! Knock around a few fuzzy balls and become a expert! #ChrisEvert #maskdonothing #Masks #COVID19 dealwithit
